TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DockPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示在某个停靠容器内公开其停靠属性的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that expose their dock properties within a docking container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停靠容器是一种允许在水平和垂直方向上（相对于停靠容器边界和容器内的其他元素）排列子元素的控件。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. 控件根据其当前的 z 顺序彼此相对停靠;其 z 顺序的位置越高，它们就是从停靠容器的指定边缘中进行的。Controls are docked relative to each other based on their current z-order; the higher their z-order placement, the further they are placed from the specified edge of the docking container. 有关可以实现此控件模式的控件的示例，请参阅[UI 自动化客户端的控件模式映射](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients)。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern. 不支持停靠容器的任何属性或控件的任何属性，这些属性可能停靠在停靠容器内的当前控件附近。 does not support any properties of the docking container or any properties of controls that might be docked adjacent to the current control within the docking container.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述
客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已缓存的属性值之前必须使用 进行请求。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用 获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用属性及其用法的信息，请参阅 。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须来自具有 引用的 ，才能获取当前值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果 是使用 获取的，则它只包含缓存的数据，尝试获取任何属性的当前值会引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用 获取以前使用 指定的属性的已缓存值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用属性及其用法的信息，请参阅 。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. param.span: 相对于停靠容器边界和容器内的其他元素的停靠位置。

span.span: The dock position relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停靠容器是一种允许在水平和垂直方向上（相对于停靠容器边界和容器内的其他元素）排列子元素的控件。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，表示支持 DockPattern 控件模式的控件的 修改了其 `dockPosition`。In the following example, an representing a control that supports the DockPattern control pattern has its `dockPosition` modified.
